name: STTSM, Beat Dropper
imagePrompt: A charismatic musician with a friendly smile, surrounded by glowing musical notes and small, enthusiastic crowd members. He's holding a microphone and a synth, with 'Gm fam!' text bubbles around him.
abilityText: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion +2 Attack. Give all others +1 Health. 'The beat dropped. So did your jaw.'
flavorText: Always starting the day with good vibes and a new beat. His sound check is everyone else's concert.
